meanings.definition: A decorative border of gold or silver embroidery.
meanings.sent1: The queen's gown was adorned with intricate orfrays along the hem.
meanings.sent2: The orfrays on the pillow added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The orfrays on the curtains shimmered in the sunlight, making the room feel like a royal chamber.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like golden orfrays, adding a touch of luxury to the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The orfrays on the tapestry gleamed like tiny stars, captivating all who entered the room.

meanings.definition: To decorate with a border of gold or silver embroidery.
meanings.sent1: She carefully orfrays the edges of the tablecloth to make it look more festive.
meanings.sent2: The tailor orfrays the sleeves of the dress to give it a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: He orfrays the curtains with silver thread, turning them into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her words orfray the story with a touch of magic, making it come alive.
meanings.sent5: The artist orfrays the painting with golden accents, making it truly stand out.
